name: Easy Beef Enchiladas
author: Meranda
summary: These beef enchiladas are so easy to make! Hope you enjoy!
ingredients: 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained  (Optional)
1 (6 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained  (Optional)
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spray a 9x13-inch casserole dish with cooking spray
Cook and stir ground beef and onion in a skillet until beef is browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Stir 1 cup Cheddar cheese, sour cream,  , and pepper into the beef mixture until cheese is melted
Mix in red enchilada sauce, chili powder, and salt
Warm tortillas in the microwave for about 1 minute
Spoon about 1/4 cup of the beef mixture into the center of each tortilla
Roll tortillas up and place in the casserole dish, seam-side down
Spoon any leftover sauce, black beans, and olives over the tortillas
Sprinkle remaining cheese over the top
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and filling is bubbling, about 20 minutes
